lead_paragraph: In the late 19th century, a motley group of stagecoach passengers - two bounty hunters, a Confederate general, an Englishman, a Frenchman and a female prisoner - become stranded in the mountains during a blizzard and take refuge at Minnie's Haberdashery, where they soon discover they all share a deadly connection.
